overview: Ziyue is cared for by her sisters in every possible way. Being used to being protected, she has repeatedly failed the exams. In the fourth elf exam, she met the mysterious elf Hei Linglong. The two unintentionally opened the seal of the Queen of Nightmare and plunged Rainbow City into crisis. Among them, in the end, through their own efforts, they finally won everyone's approval.
title: Magie Elf
